aboutUSPart1: IMEXB Gmbh is a young company in the field of building materials trade.
aboutUSPart2: With the support of our 40 years family business in the field of extraction, processing and distribution of natural building stones, as well as with our work and scientific experience in the field of architecture, building physics and marketing ,we started our activity with the sale of natural building stones, but to work with new partners We will always be ready to sell their products in the global markets.
aboutUSPart3: We try to give a correct image of our stones by means of high quality photography and 3D design. However, as it is a natural product, there may be structural and colour variations in the delivered product.
home_section_1_title: LET YOURSELF BE MOVED BY OUR MATERIALS
home_section_1_body: "Marble is like a diamond: absolutely perfect if it is the right color, free from defects and well cut. Remove one of the components and immediately lose value".
homeTitleSh: Sales are not our ultimate goal, your trust will be our capital.
